Just leave the guy alone, real people talk about
trivial facts and so fantasy characters should talk
about trivial facts to seem realistic, just leave him
alone.

--- Hollywood Narrator Countdown <thecode@...>
wrote:
> OOC: Stupid, boring, useless, what was the point of
> this post? Get serious about your posts or get
> out...
>

>   From: cardhead649
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

> Pit are you)
> 
> 
>   "Well, I've heard the Rogues talk about Megatron,"
> she admits.  "From 
>   what they said, he's not exactly the nicest bot
> around."
>

>   > Flicker:  Why wouldn't it be?

> asks,
